column4: good morning... I've updated my xorg driver and mesa stuff from the repository xorg-edgers and I finally have something stable and working... now how do I "lock" the packages, because those packages seem to be updated every day and I do not want to keep upgrading
you can disable automatic updates in System-Admin
I don't want to disable ALL automatic updates, just any from the xorg-edgers repo
then why not remove that repo from the sources list?
